item.title: Calculator Program
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Class: 

public class Calculator {
	Calculator(int a, int b, String operation) {
		num1 = a;
		num2 = b;
		function = operation;
	}
	public static int num1;
	public static int num2;
	public static String function;
	public static double answer;
	public static void calculate(int a, int b, String operation) {
		if (operation.equals("Addition")) {
			answer = a + b;
		}
		if (operation.equals("Subtraction")) {
			answer = a - b;
		}
		if (operation.equals("Multiplication")) {
			answer = a * b;
		}
		if (operation.equals("Division")) {
			answer = a / b;
		}
		if (operation.equals("Root")) {
			answer = a;
			while (b >= 2) {
				answer *= a;
				b--;
			}
		} 
	}
	public static void main (String[] args) {
		int a = Integer.parseInt(args[0]);
		int b = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
		String c = args[2];
		Calculator c1 = new Calculator(a, b, c);
		c1.calculate(num1, num2, function);
		System.out.println(answer);
	}
}

Output: 

Number 1: 4
Number 2: 4
Operation: Addition
8.0
Press any key to continue . . .
Number 1: 4
Number 2: 4
Operation: Subtraction
0.0
Press any key to continue . . .
Number 1: 4
Number 2: 4
Operation: Multiplication
16.0
Press any key to continue . . .
Number 1: 4
Number 2: 4
Operation: Division
1.0
Press any key to continue . . .
Number 1: 4
Number 2: 4
Operation: Root
256.0
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
